## Section Four

```{r student4}
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(tidyr)
url="https://www2.census.gov/geo/tiger/TIGER2023/ROADS/"
x=readLines(url)
GEOID_url=x %>% str_extract(pattern="tl_2023_\\d{5}_roads.zip")
GEOID_url=na.omit(GEOID_url)
GEOID=GEOID_url %>% str_extract(pattern="\\d{5}")



url1=paste0(GEOID_url[1])
url11=str_c("https://www2.census.gov/geo/tiger/TIGER2023/ROADS/",url1)
d=download.file(url11,dest="data.zip",method="auto")
unzip("data.zip")



```
